column2: Reduce all of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s playable vassals' opinion of [Root.GetHerHim] by §R-25§! for §Y3§! years. This only affects patricians or count- or higher-tier vassals-- not vassal barons from [Root.GetHerHis] demesne.

Increase all of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s playable vassals' opinion of [Root.GetHerHim] by §G25§! for §Y3§! years. This only affects patricians or count- or higher-tier vassals-- not vassal barons from [Root.GetHerHis] demesne.
Has at least one playable vassal\n
